## Try Lasso!!

import and clean birthweight data

```{r}
bwt_df = 
  read_csv("data/birthweight.csv") |> 
  janitor::clean_names() |> 
  mutate(
    babysex = 
      case_match(babysex, 
                 1 ~ "male",
                 2 ~ "female"),
     babysex = fct_infreq(babysex),
    frace = 
        case_match(frace,
            1 ~ "white",
            2 ~ "black", 
            3 ~ "asian", 
            4 ~ "puerto rican", 
            8 ~ "other"),
    frace = fct_infreq(frace),
    mrace = 
        case_match(mrace,
            1 ~ "white",
            2 ~ "black", 
            3 ~ "asian", 
            4 ~ "puerto rican",
            8 ~ "other"),
    mrace = fct_infreq(mrace),
    malform = as.logical(malform)
    ) |> 
  sample_n(200)
```
